aircraft.value: Sparrow Light - AC-8523-743 at Sector East Station

defect_observed.value: Filter bypass indicator activation. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Functional testing confirmed the reported anomaly.

corrective_action.value: Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation

remarks_investigation.value: Complete defect analysis performed. Lessons learned documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 17/01/2025 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality assurance review completed. Recommend enhanced incoming inspection criteria for this component type. Date: 20/01/2025 Signature: Sqn Ldr H.S. Bhatia

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) Fleet experience reviewed. Similar occurrences noted on other platforms. Support fleet-wide inspection. Date: 20/01/2025 Signature: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality oversight review completed. Recommend monitoring effectiveness of implemented preventive actions. Date: 24/01/2025 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Design aspects reviewed from certification authority perspective. Investigation is thorough and conclusions are sound. Date: 25/01/2025 Signature: Dr. P.L. Mehta

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Observation
b) Defect Observed: Filter bypass indicator activation. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Software algorithm error in control logic implementation
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Brake System component. Functional
testing confirmed the reported anomaly.
c) Remedial Measures Implement enhanced testing protocol before component installation
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Conduct fleet-wide inspection campaign
d) Attributable Code: M - Other Reasons
